name: Sebastian Michel 0001
content: Prof. Dr.-Ing. Sebastian Michel | DBIS Lab Email: sebastian.michel@cs.rptu.de Phone: +49 631 205 5628 Room: 36/330 Postal address: RPTU Kaiserslautern-Landau Department of Computer Science AG DBIS P.O. Box 3049 67653 Kaiserslautern, Germany As of August 2014 I am Chair of the Databases and Information Systems Group (DBIS) at RPTU Kaiserslautern-Landau (TU Kaiserslautern) Below you find a brief overview of my academic career and research. If you are a student at RPTU and in the phase of looking for possible Bachelorâs or Masterâs thesis topics, please do not hesitate to contacting me directly. Academic Career Since August 2014, Full Professor (W3) at RPTU (TU Kaiserslautern) 05/2010-07/2014: Senior Researcher at Max-Planck Institute Informatics, SaarbrÃ¼cken. 08/2009-07/2014: Independent Research Group Leader (W2) at Saarland University (MMCI) 08/2007-07/2009: Postdoc at LSIR lab at EPF Lausanne (EPFL) 03/2004-07/2007: PhD student at DBIS group (D5) at Max-Planck Institute Informatics / Saarland University, SaarbrÃ¼cken Academic Administration Services Since 01/2023: Vice Dean (Prodekan) of the CS department Since 01/2017: Member of the CS department council (Fachbereichsrat) 01/2017-12/2022: Head of examination board of the CS Bachelorâs study program and member of the Masterâs examination board Recent Reviewing Activities PC member of SIGMOD 2026, VLDB 2026, SIGMOD 2025, VLDB 2025, BTW 2025, ICDE 2024, ACM SoCC 2023, EDBT 2023 Reviewer for VLDBJ, IEEE TKDE, ACM TOIS, ACM TOIT, IEEE TPDS Reviewer for European Union (FP7), German Research Foundation (DFG), and Swiss National Science Foundation (SNSF), German Academic Exchange Service (DAAD) Publications See also My Google Scholar Profile | My DBLP Entry Automated Training of Learned Database Components with Generative AI.
